text: Saint Lucia competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Saint Lucia entered four swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Jayhan Odlum-Smith |align=left|50 m butterfly |25.47 |63 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m butterfly |56.31 |55 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Jean-Luc Zephir |align=left|50 m freestyle |23.51 |64 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m freestyle |51.65 |=67 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Women {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font- size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Mikaili Charlemagne |align=left|100 m freestyle |1:00.27 |65 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m butterfly |29.24 |42 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Naima Hazell |align=left|50 m freestyle |27.85 |=59 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m breaststroke |34.79 |42 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Saint Lucia at the World Aquatics Championships World Aquatics Championships
